item.title: Reuters reveals scores of Google rivals want EU tech law used in antitrust case
item.dc:creator: Ramisa Tasnim
item.description:
Reuters exclusively revealed more than 40 European rivals to Google’s shopping service urged European Union (EU) antitrust regulators to use […]

The post Reuters reveals scores of Google rivals want EU tech law used in antitrust case appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
item.content:encoded:
Reuters exclusively revealed more than 40 European rivals to Google’s shopping service urged European Union (EU) antitrust regulators to use newly adopted tech rules to ensure the Alphabet unit complies with a 2017 EU order to allow more competition on its search page. The European Commission fined Google 2.4 billion euros five years ago and told the firm to stop favouring its shopping service.

The post Reuters reveals scores of Google rivals want EU tech law used in antitrust case appeared first on Reuters News Agency.

item.title: Reuters reveals Google faces EU antitrust charges over its adtech business
item.dc:creator: Ramisa Tasnim
item.description:
Reuters exclusively reported that Alphabet unit Google could face European Union (EU) antitrust charges next year over its digital advertising […]

The post Reuters reveals Google faces EU antitrust charges over its adtech business appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
item.content:encoded:
Reuters exclusively reported that Alphabet unit Google could face European Union (EU) antitrust charges next year over its digital advertising business, putting the company at risk of its fourth fine in the EU of more than a billion euros. Google’s ad business, which generated over $100 billion in sales last year, is Alphabet’s biggest moneymaker.

The post Reuters reveals Google faces EU antitrust charges over its adtech business appeared first on Reuters News Agency.

item.title: Reuters reveals chip toolmaker KLA to stop sales and service to China to comply with U.S. export curbs
item.dc:creator: Ramisa Tasnim
item.description:
Reuters exclusively reported U.S. chip toolmaker KLA Corp will cease offering some supplies and services to China-based customers including South […]

The post Reuters reveals chip toolmaker KLA to stop sales and service to China to comply with U.S. export curbs appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
item.content:encoded:
Reuters exclusively reported U.S. chip toolmaker KLA Corp will cease offering some supplies and services to China-based customers including South Korea’s SK Hynix in compliance with recent U.S. regulations. The move underscores huge business headwinds facing chipmakers and chip equipment makers around the world, as the Biden administration published a sweeping set of export controls on Friday aimed at slowing China’s progress in advanced chip manufacturing.

The post Reuters reveals chip toolmaker KLA to stop sales and service to China to comply with U.S. export curbs appeared first on Reuters News Agency.

item.title: Reuters reveals senior Indonesian officials targeted by spyware last year
item.dc:creator: Ramisa Tasnim
item.description:
Reuters exclusively revealed more than a dozen senior Indonesian government and military officials were targeted last year with spy software […]

The post Reuters reveals senior Indonesian officials targeted by spyware last year appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
item.content:encoded:
Reuters exclusively revealed more than a dozen senior Indonesian government and military officials were targeted last year with spy software designed by an Israeli surveillance firm. The targets included Chief Economic Minister Airlangga Hartarto, senior military personnel, two regional diplomats, and advisers in Indonesia’s defence and foreign affairs ministries. 

The post Reuters reveals senior Indonesian officials targeted by spyware last year appeared first on Reuters News Agency.

item.title: Reuters exclusively reveals EU telcos call Big Tech for shared network costs, citing energy crisis, EU climate change
item.dc:creator: Ramisa Tasnim
item.description:
Reuters was first to report Deutsche Telekom, Orange, Telefonica and 13 other European telecoms providers today made their strongest push […]

The post Reuters exclusively reveals EU telcos call Big Tech for shared network costs, citing energy crisis, EU climate change appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
item.content:encoded:
Reuters was first to report Deutsche Telekom, Orange, Telefonica and 13 other European telecoms providers today made their strongest push for Big Tech to share network costs, citing the energy crisis and European Union climate change goals. The call comes as the European Commission prepares to seek feedback from both sides before making a legislative proposal that could force tech companies to help pay for the roll-out of 5G and fibre cables across the 27-country European Union

The post Reuters exclusively reveals EU telcos call Big Tech for shared network costs, citing energy crisis, EU climate change appeared first on Reuters News Agency.

item.title: Reuters reveals Biden to hit China with broader curbs on U.S. chip and tool exports
item.dc:creator: Ramisa Tasnim
item.description:
Reuters was first to report that the Biden administration plans next month to broaden curbs on U.S shipments to China […]

The post Reuters reveals Biden to hit China with broader curbs on U.S. chip and tool exports appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
item.content:encoded:
Reuters was first to report that the Biden administration plans next month to broaden curbs on U.S shipments to China of semiconductors used for artificial intelligence and chipmaking tools. The move would expand the reach of the limits and could subject other U.S. companies producing similar technology to the restrictions. 

The post Reuters reveals Biden to hit China with broader curbs on U.S. chip and tool exports appeared first on Reuters News Agency.

item.title: Reuters reveals deal partner for Trump’s Truth Social fails to get backing for SPAC extension
item.dc:creator: Ramisa Tasnim
item.description:
Reuters exclusively reported that the blank-check acquisition firm Digital World Acquisition Corp failed to muster enough shareholder support for a […]

The post Reuters reveals deal partner for Trump’s Truth Social fails to get backing for SPAC extension appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
item.content:encoded:
Reuters exclusively reported that the blank-check acquisition firm Digital World Acquisition Corp failed to muster enough shareholder support for a proposal to extend its life by one year so it can complete a merger with former U.S. President Donald Trump’s social media company. At stake is a $1.3 billion cash infusion that Trump Media & Technology Group, which operates Trump’s Truth Social app, stands to receive from Digital World. Digital World subsequently confirmed it did not get enough shareholder votes in favor of the proposal and pushed back the vote deadline by two days. Shares of Digital World Acquisition Corp fell as much as 27% after Reuters revealed the news. 

The post Reuters reveals deal partner for Trump’s Truth Social fails to get backing for SPAC extension appeared first on Reuters News Agency.

item.title: Reuters reveals Illumina in talks with EU regulators to divest Grail
item.dc:creator: Ramisa Tasnim
item.description:
Reuters exclusively reported that U.S. life sciences company Illumina is in talks with European Union (EU) antitrust regulators to divest Grail […]

The post Reuters reveals Illumina in talks with EU regulators to divest Grail appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
item.content:encoded:
Reuters exclusively reported that U.S. life sciences company Illumina is in talks with European Union (EU) antitrust regulators to divest Grail ahead of an expected EU veto of its $7.1 billion acquisition of the biotechnology company. The European Commission confirmed the Reuters story the next day and blocked the deal because remedies offered by Illumina did not fully address the EU competition enforcer’s concerns.

The post Reuters reveals Illumina in talks with EU regulators to divest Grail appeared first on Reuters News Agency.

item.title: Reuters reveals Apple, Samsung could benefit as India aims to speed product safety approvals
item.dc:creator: Ramisa Tasnim
item.description:
Reuters was first to report India will try out a strategy of parallel testing to speed up safety approvals for […]

The post Reuters reveals Apple, Samsung could benefit as India aims to speed product safety approvals appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
item.content:encoded:
Reuters was first to report India will try out a strategy of parallel testing to speed up safety approvals for new electronic devices, a move that could boost device launch plans by the likes of Samsung and Apple. The move comes as India scrambles to remove bottlenecks faced by businesses, with Prime Minister Narendra Modi bullish on an electronics hardware manufacturing industry his government targets to be worth $300 billion by 2026.

The post Reuters reveals Apple, Samsung could benefit as India aims to speed product safety approvals appeared first on Reuters News Agency.

item.title: Reuters reveals U.S. sought records on Binance CEO for crypto money laundering probe
item.dc:creator: Ramisa Tasnim
item.description:
Reuters exclusively revealed U.S. federal prosecutors asked Binance, the world’s largest cryptocurrency exchange, to provide extensive internal records about its […]

The post Reuters reveals U.S. sought records on Binance CEO for crypto money laundering probe appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
item.content:encoded: The post Reuters reveals U.S. sought records on Binance CEO for crypto money laundering probe appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
